entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
